name: @ogod/site
description: Presentation web site that uses OGOD core & three.
author: Elvynia

scripts.build: npm run compile && polymer build --name ghpages
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && npm run build && touch build/ghpages/.nojekyll && cp LICENSE README.md build/ghpages/ && git add -A && git commit --allow-empty -m "Auto deploying polymer build to gh-pages." && git subtree push --prefix build/ghpages origin gh-pages && git checkout master
